reviews_service.database module

reviews_service.database.get_db()[source]

reviews_service.main module

Reviews Service

This module defines the FastAPI service responsible for handling room reviews in the Smart Meeting Room system. It exposes endpoints to create, list, update, and delete reviews associated with room bookings.

class reviews_service.main.ReviewCreate(*, username: str, rating: Annotated[int, Ge(ge=1), Le(le=5)], comment: str | None = None, booking_id: int)[source]

reviews_service.main.create_review(room_id: int, payload: ReviewCreate) → ReviewResponse[source]

Create a new review for a given room.

This endpoint records a review associated with a specific room and booking. It validates the rating range and stores the review in the in-memory list.

Parameters:

  • room_id – Identifier of the room being reviewed.

  • payload – ReviewCreate object containing username, rating, comment, and booking identifier.

Returns:

The created review including its generated identifier and creation timestamp.

Return type:

ReviewResponse

reviews_service.main.delete_review(review_id: int) → dict[source]

Delete an existing review.

Parameters:

review_id – Identifier of the review to delete.

Returns:

A confirmation message including the identifier of the deleted review.

Return type:

dict

Raises:

HTTPException – If the review does not exist.

reviews_service.main.get_review_or_404(review_id: int) → ReviewResponse[source]

Retrieve a review by its identifier or raise a 404 error.

Parameters:

review_id – Unique identifier of the review to retrieve.

Returns:

The matching review object.

Return type:

ReviewResponse

Raises:

HTTPException – If no review exists with the given identifier.

reviews_service.main.list_room_reviews(room_id: int) → List[ReviewResponse][source]

List all reviews for a specific room.

Parameters:

room_id – Identifier of the room whose reviews should be returned.

Returns:

All reviews that belong to the specified room.

Return type:

List[ReviewResponse]

reviews_service.main.update_review(review_id: int, payload: ReviewUpdate) → ReviewResponse[source]

Update the rating and/or comment of an existing review.

Parameters:

  • review_id – Identifier of the review that should be updated.

  • payload – ReviewUpdate object containing the new rating and/or comment.

Returns:

The updated review object.

Return type:

ReviewResponse

Raises:

HTTPException – If the review does not exist.
